players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and make sure we don't let the mafia slip through our fingers."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice. Let's all keep a close eye on each other to ensure the safety of our village."
You: "I believe we should focus on finding out who killed Bob last night. Let's try to gather as much information as possible during this discussion round."
